article_title: Authorities: One Person Shot Multiple Times In Pott. County - News9.com - Oklahoma City, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports
article_text:
One person was taken to the hospital after being shot multiple times in Pottawatomie County, Oklahoma, late Sunday night.

According to the Pott. County Undersheriff, the victim was taken by vehicle to a Quick Stop in Asher, Oklahoma, before being lifted to tan Oklahoma City hospital via helicopter. The victim suffered non-life-threatening injuries.

The suspect is still at large. More details as they come in.
